channel.title: Need Some Help With BCEL Updater Creation
channel.description:
Hi, I require some help with BCEL Updater Creation.
From what I've read around the forums I realize that people will not release a updater that works. I find it hard for me to learn if I have no idea what a updater should or might look like. Fortunately I was able to find a few updaters that were incomplete and I've started to break them down.
Currently I'm looking at thebanks simple updater (Located: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,288851.0.html). I see that it is very simple indeed and really gives me nothing else to jump off of.
Note: For all intents and purposes I've read ever guide on this site word for word. And have been using google as a reference.
If anyone could introduce me to a more complete yet simple updater it would be most helpful. Or perhaps point me in a direction with thebanks' simple updater. I'm always looking for better and more efficient ways to learn and nothing is too difficult with a guide or outline. So anything is appreciated; but I prefer something to the lines of thebanks' style.
Thanks for all you help and consideration ;)

item.title: Need Some Help With BCEL Updater Creation
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“killa4444, post:6, topic:270976”]Understood.

Perhaps I’ll look into it a bit more before asking. :rolleyes:[/quote]http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/
http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/java/library/j-dyn0414/
and the tutorials found in http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,334616.0.html

They should help.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Some Help With BCEL Updater Creation

item.title: Need Some Help With BCEL Updater Creation
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:4, topic:270976”]Updaters are needed to run bots. Figure out what fields you will need to have hooked in order to create a useful bot, and hook them.[/quote]Learn Java, and then learn how to apply the BCEL to your code, and how to manipulate classes via the BCEL.

At this point, you should have enough knowledge that you will come back to this thread, read your request, and slap yourself for ever being do foolish.

You will also need to look through the current and previous client versions, to find useful patterns for finding the fields you need.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Some Help With BCEL Updater Creation

item.title: Need Some Help With BCEL Updater Creation
item.dc:creator: @killa4444 killa4444
item.description:
@killa4444 wrote:

Note: For all intents and purposes I've read ever guide on this site word for word. And have been using google as a reference.

If anyone could introduce me to a more complete yet simple updater it would be most helpful. Or perhaps point me in the right direction.

I stated that I required some insight on where to continue. At no point did I ask for you to give me every step by step process. Learning it is what I need to take up by myself but pointing me to a direction is a decent request I believe.

I'm sorry for annoying you, I'll wait for someone else to help point me in a direction.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Some Help With BCEL Updater Creation
